title: (BONUS EP) Graduation Crimes
description: In this month's bonus episode, the gals reminisce about the glory days at their alma maters. Topics include an intense ceremony decorum enforcer, a little-appreciated and not-so-athletic varsity sport, and a chicken finger heist for the ages. Pop open a bottle of Winc's The Independent White Blend, schedule your campus visit, and tune in for Graduation Crimes.
itunes:author: Wine & Crime Podcast
dc:creator: Wine & Crime Podcast
